layout_strategy.spacing: Use generous padding. Section gaps: py-20 or py-24. Card internal padding: p-6 or p-8.
layout_strategy.alignment: Center-align Hero text for impact. Left-align all detailed content, lists, and forms for readability.

hero_shopper.description: Happy shopper holding bags, use for Landing Page Hero or Success State.

amazon_boxes.description: Stack of Amazon boxes, use for 'How it works' or 'Analyze' section.

clean_desk.description: Minimalist workspace, use for 'Premium' or 'Dashboard' background context.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a clean, high-trust interface. Avoid clutter. Focus on the 'Score' as the hero element of the results.
instructions_to_main_agent.results_page: Do not use a simple list. Use a 'Bento Grid' layout. The Score Gauge must be the most prominent element. Use color coding (Green/Amber/Red) strictly for the score and verdict.
instructions_to_main_agent.input_interaction: The main input on the home page should feel 'heavy' and substantial (h-16, shadow-sm). It is the main door to the app's value.
instructions_to_main_agent.trust_signals: Sprinkle 'Verified by AI', 'Updated just now', and lock icons subtly throughout the UI.
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile_responsiveness: Ensure the Bento grid collapses to a single column on mobile. The Score Gauge should remain centered and large on mobile.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
